scheme_name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship for College Students
description: Merit-based scholarship for undergraduate students.
eligibility: Top-performing Class XII students with family income below ₹8 lakh.

scheme_name: Postgraduate Scholarship Scheme for SC/ST Students
description: Scholarship for SC/ST students pursuing postgraduate courses.
eligibility: SC/ST students with family income below ₹4 lakh, enrolled in postgraduate programs.

description: Scholarship for top-ranking students in Class XII for higher education.
eligibility: Students in the top 1% of their Class XII exams, with family income below ₹6 lakh.

description: Scholarships for meritorious students from economically weaker sections.
eligibility: Students in Class VIII to X with family income below ₹1.5 lakh per annum.

scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Ensures employment for at least 100 days per year for rural households.
eligibility: Any rural household willing to work for manual labor in government projects.

description: A pension scheme for workers in the unorganized sector.
eligibility: Individuals between 18-40 years, with no formal pension coverage.

description: Affordable housing for urban and rural poor.
eligibility: Families with annual income below ₹6 lakh, looking for a house in urban or rural areas.

description: Health insurance scheme for economically weaker sections.
eligibility: Families with an annual income below ₹6 lakh.

description: Provides access to financial services for the unbanked.
eligibility: Indian citizens with no previous access to banking services.

description: Financial assistance for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.
eligibility: SC/ST and women entrepreneurs looking to start their own business.

description: Provides loans to small businesses and entrepreneurs.
eligibility: Any individual with a business idea and no access to formal credit.

description: Self-employment program for urban youth.
eligibility: Urban youth between 18-45 years with an income below ₹5 lakh.

description: Social assistance for the elderly, widows, and persons with disabilities.
eligibility: Senior citizens above 60 years with income below ₹1 lakh.

description: Provides free LPG connections to families below the poverty line.
eligibility: BPL families and women-headed households.

scheme_name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
description: Skill development program for rural youth.
eligibility: Rural youth aged 15-35 years with an income below ₹3 lakh.

description: Comprehensive skill development program.
eligibility: Youth aged 18-45 years willing to undergo skill training.

description: Scheme for the welfare and education of girls.
eligibility: Families with daughters below 18 years of age.

description: Cleanliness drive to ensure sanitation facilities in rural areas.
eligibility: Residents in rural areas and cities working on sanitation projects.

description: Enhancing agricultural productivity and ensuring food security.
eligibility: Farmers and agricultural workers.

description: Direct income support for farmers.
eligibility: All farmers who own agricultural land are eligible.

description: Financial assistance for youth to start businesses in Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility: Youth aged 18-40 years, willing to start a business.

description: Encourages apprenticeship training for youth in various sectors.
eligibility: Youth aged 14-35 years, registered with the scheme.

scheme_name: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
description: Health insurance for economically weaker families.
eligibility: Families with an income below ₹5 lakh.

scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment in rural areas.
eligibility: Rural households willing to engage in manual labor.

description: Provides free LPG connections to women from BPL families.
eligibility: Women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) families.

description: Provides life insurance cover to rural and unorganized sector workers.
eligibility: Rural workers, self-employed persons, and low-income individuals.

description: Promotes cleanliness and sanitation across the nation.
eligibility: Citizens involved in cleanliness activities.

description: Insurance coverage for farmers' crops.
eligibility: Farmers who have taken loans or are growing crops.

description: A scheme to ensure the safety and education of girls.
eligibility: Families with daughters below the age of 18 years.
